pr_title: [DOCS] Add data streams to EQL search docs

timeline.message:
[DOCS] Add data streams to EQL search docs

Makes the existing EQL search docs aware of data streams.

timeline.bodyText: As of this writing, a bug prevents this from resolving to data streams. See #58562.
